content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Hassan. I would like to offer you a rental price of 1500 Euros per month. This is a fair and competitive rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1500 Euros.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, Hassan! I'm glad you found the rental price acceptable. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before we can finalize the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have one question. When will the rental agreement be available for signing?

Also, can I pay the rent online?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: The rental agreement will be available for signing once both parties have reviewed and agreed to the terms. As for payment, we can certainly discuss the option of paying rent online. Would you be interested in this?
name: Heinrich Heine
